PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FireSuppressionTerminalTypeBreechingInlet
PropertySetDef.Definition: Symmetrical pipe fitting that unites two or more inlets into a single pipe (BS6100 330 114 adapted).

PropertyDef.Name: BreechingInletType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the type of breeching inlet.

PropertyDef.Name: CouplingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Defines the type coupling on the inlet of the breeching inlet.

PropertyDef.Name: HasCaps
PropertyDef.Definition: Does the inlet connection have protective caps.

PropertyDef.Name: InletDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The inlet diameter of the breeching inlet.

PropertyDef.Name: OutletDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The outlet diameter of the breeching inlet.
